pages.text: A savory juice made of tomatos. It's jam packed full of nutrients to keep healthy even in the deepest dungeons!

pages.title: Tomato Juice
pages.text: $(br) Time: 30min$(br)2-3 Servings$(br2)$(l) Ingredients - $()$(br)$(li) 1.1 lb tomatos$(li) 1 cups water$(li) 1 tbsp salt or sugar (optional) $(br2)

$(li)Wash and roughly chop tomatos. Place tomato chunks in saucepan with water. Cook over medium-high heat, stirring continuously. $(li)Remove saucepan from burner and drain into a cheese cloth-lined sieve or juice bag over a large bowl. Press and squeeze the mash to release the juice. Discard the mash.
$(li) Add sugar or salt (optional). $(li)Return to saucepan and heat until just about boiling. Remove from burner, cool, and refrigerate.
